responsibilities: Developed HR chatbot using Python, Django, and Dialogflow for 500k+ employees
Implemented feedback mechanisms using PostgreSQL for user behavior analysis
Created automation tool reducing bot creation time by 90%
Designed Bot classifier using SVC, TFIDF, and NLP, reducing search time by 70%
Implemented REST API-integrated ticket system, reducing escalations by 30%
Developed automated Python log analysis tool for production logs
Facilitated daily stand-ups and sprint planning in Agile environment
Engineered the GeneTerrain visualization web application using WebGPU, TypeScript, React
Collected and preprocessed GBM clinical cancer data, managing it in Oracle Apex database
Utilized Google Firebase for secure authentication and real-time noSQL data storage
Designed and implemented RESTful API using Python Flask for gene data
Implemented deployment using docker on AWS EC2 cloud with nginx

content.value: A comprehensive guide to best practices and techniques for programming in Java, written by a former Java platform engineer.
A fast-paced introduction to programming with Python, including practical projects for beginners to solidify their learning.
A deep dive into the core features of JavaScript, explaining its strengths and quirks to help developers write better code.
